items.title: Comedy on Prescription? Pilot Raises Hopes for NHS Care
items.description: Early pilot data suggest comedy-based social prescribing could complement care, boost wellbeing, and ease pressure on NHS services. Press Association

items.title: Study Maps Extensive Disease Links Beyond Childhood Eczema
items.description: Using millions of NHS records, researchers mapped extensive links between childhood eczema and later inflammatory and eye diseases. Medscape News UK

items.title: Home Visits Don't Reduce Heat-Related ED Use in Older Adults
